Stacey and John are getting married on 28 May 2022

If you haven't responded yet, please RSVP as soon as you can.

The Day

Please aim to arrive at the venue at 4:00pm

The ceremony

The ceremony starts at 4:30pm and will last approximately 30-40 minutes. A drinks reception will follow, outside on the lawn if the weather permits.

Guests will be served canap√©s.

Dinner & speeches

Starters served at 6:00pm

You will be served a two course dinner, followed by wedding cake and/or your choice from our cheese table.

Dinner will be followed by speeches.

Please ensure you select your dinner options when you RSVP.

The Evening

The evening activities start at 8pm.

Music

We'll take to the dancefloor at 8pm for the first dance. This will be swiftly followed by music from the excellent Joel White & the Diamond Experience, with a short set from The Great Fire.

Food

Finger food will be served from 9pm and a selection of pick and mix sweets will be available throughout.

Taxis

The music and the bar finish at 11pm, so taxis should be booked for 11:15pm at the latest.
